display_long_description:
# Welcome to Dimension Drop!
Get ready to move, think, and groove in Dimension Drop, a reality-bending VR adventure that’s two incredible games in one! Whether you love clever puzzles or heart-pounding rhythm action, a unique and endlessly replayable experience awaits.

# On Tour: The Ultimate Rhythm Shooter
Step into the spotlight and become a rhythm legend! This isn’t just about shooting targets—it’s about putting on a show.

- Feel the Music: Blast your way through a massive library of over 60 electrifying tracks.

- Get Physical: Dip your blasters into pools of paint to match colors on the fly. With dynamic color shuffling, no two songs ever play the same!

- Climb the Ranks: Master perfect timing for huge scores, dominate the local leaderboards! Can you beat yours?

- Find Your Flow: Test your skills with 2 colors on Easy, 3 on Normal, or a truly frantic 6 on Extreme!

# Puzzle Cascade: An Endless Adventure for Your Brain
Ready to switch gears? Challenge your mind in a puzzle world that's always new and exciting.

- Truly Endless Fun: You will never run out of levels! Our game creates a brand new, clever puzzle for you every single time you play.

- Unlock & Explore: Journey through gorgeous themed worlds, each with unique challenges, grid shapes, and its own 10-track soundtrack.

- Think Strategically: Outsmart a variety of clever obstacles like Crates, Frozen Blocks, and Balloons. Every move counts!

Master the Cascade. Dominate the Tour.
